info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BELMONT AND MARSHALL COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McMechen, or near Moundsville, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Moundsville, Shadyside, McMechen, Powhatan Point, Glen Dale, Lone Oak, Grove Oak, Grand Vue Park, Sherrard, and Glendale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
